name: Kelly Hamilton
description: The ratings on this camera say that the ISO goes up very high, which is true. However, what they don't tell you is that the ISO is Automatic and there is no way to set it yourself in Manuel Mode.

name: Mehedi Hasan
description: The ratings on this camera say that the ISO goes up very high, which is true. However, what they don't tell you is that the ISO is Automatic and there is no way to set it yourself in Manuel Mode. You can change the aperture and Shutter speed but it will automatically choose your ISO.

name: Md Rakin
description: Love that I can use the camera connect app to operate the camera and view photos on my phone instantly. Took a few tries to figure it out, but it works.

name: Md Rafat
description: I am brand spanking new to photography and DSLR cameras. Thanks to a few hours at the University of YouTube, I think I have the hang of it. So my review is partial, but from the perspective of a total novice to photography and something other than a point and shoot camera.

name: Md Piyas
description: The Canon Rebel T6 is also known as the 1300D throughout the world. Without getting too technical, this model is a great entry level camera for novice photographers to learn the art of photography. The two lenses that are included provide the ability to take desirable photos near and far.

name: Mat Higham
description: The ratings on this camera say that the ISO goes up very high, which is true. However, what they don't tell you is that the ISO is Automatic and there is no way to set it yourself in Manuel Mode. You can change the aperture and Shutter speed but it will automatically choose your ISO.
